about_the_game:
Shapes & Shots is a Roguelite Shooter Bullet-hell , where you can control time as you make your way through a twisted and delusional universe. Your enemies will merge, creating infinite combinations to try to overwhelm you: only your skills, combined with the variety of upgrades you choose, can lead you to victory.

When it gets tough out there and you realize there is no cover, or when you are about to be overwhelmed by a barrage of bullets... Stop everything, take a deep breath, and reposition yourself behind the enemies. Unload all your might against them and turn the tide.

In this universe, enemies can merge, combine the power of their weapons, and gain unique characteristics. Take care of them before they realize that unity is strength.

Challenges will increase: you must level up to increase your base characteristics. Choose whether to enhance the ability to control time or to increase mobility and damage.

But that is not all. In your climb to victory, you will find many chests that will grant you access to unique game-changing powers!
